snippet: Mr. Juppé, who rebounded in politics after a 2004 graft conviction, said he would compete to be the candidate of France’s main conservative party.
abstract: Former French premier Alain Juppe, now mayor of Bordeaux, announces that he is seeking nomination of France's main conservative party for president.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Juppé, who rebounded in politics after a 2004 graft conviction, said he would compete to be the candidate of France’s main conservative party.

headline.main: Alain Juppé, Ex-Premier of France, Seeks Party’s Nomination for President
headline.print_headline: Ex-Premier Seeks Top Post in France
